G

generateManifest(File) - Method in class com.mediaworx.opencms.moduleutils.manifestgenerator.OpenCmsModuleManifestGenerator
Deprecated.
This method is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Please use generateManifest(File, String) instead.
generateManifest(File, String) - Method in class com.mediaworx.opencms.moduleutils.manifestgenerator.OpenCmsModuleManifestGenerator
Generates the manifest.xml for OpenCms modules from meta files (manifest_stub.xml and separate meta files for all files and folders in the VFS).
getMetaInfoPath(String, String, boolean) - Static method in class com.mediaworx.opencms.moduleutils.manifestgenerator.OpenCmsModuleManifestGenerator
Gets the path to the meta info file for the VFS file or folder at the given VFS path.

OpenCmsModuleManifestGenerator() - Constructor for class com.mediaworx.opencms.moduleutils.manifestgenerator.OpenCmsModuleManifestGenerator

S

setModuleVersion(String) - Method in class com.mediaworx.opencms.moduleutils.manifestgenerator.OpenCmsModuleManifestGenerator
Allows to set a specific module version that is replacing the module version from the manifest stub.
setReplaceDateVariables(boolean) - Method in class com.mediaworx.opencms.moduleutils.manifestgenerator.OpenCmsModuleManifestGenerator
Sets the flag indicating if date variables (${datelastmodified} and ${datecreated}) should be replaced with generated values.
setReplaceIdVariables(boolean) - Method in class com.mediaworx.opencms.moduleutils.manifestgenerator.OpenCmsModuleManifestGenerator
Sets the flag indicating if UUID variables (${uuidstructure} and ${uuidresource}) should be replaced with generated values.
setReplaceMetaVariables(boolean) - Method in class com.mediaworx.opencms.moduleutils.manifestgenerator.OpenCmsModuleManifestGenerator
Deprecated.
Use setReplaceDateVariables(boolean) and setReplaceIdVariables(boolean) instead, may be removed in future versions.
